sentences.sContent: ...a sister craft of the crashed spaceplane was reported to be about half-finished...
...had recently suggested that a SpaceShipTwo craft would carry its first paying customers as soon as February 2015...
...Thus talking came first; writing is just a craft that came along later...
...if only because many of the nation's assembly line workers were skilled in craft work...
...stranding thousands of young people who seek training for a craft without going to college...
...a New York University sociologist who has written about the connection of craft and culture...

phrases.pCn: 工艺美术设计；手工艺设计

trans.tranOther: a job or activity in which you make things with your hands, and that you usually need skill to do
to make something using a special skill, especially with your hands
